meanings.definition: To have as belonging to one; own.
meanings.sent1: She is possessing a beautiful necklace.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys possessing a large collection of books.
meanings.sent3: The cat is possessing the sunny spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were possessing a look of determination.
meanings.sent5: The old house is possessing a mysterious aura.

meanings.definition: To have in one's power or control.
meanings.sent1: The magician is possessing amazing tricks.
meanings.sent2: The king was known for possessing great wealth.
meanings.sent3: The toddler is possessing the remote control and giggling.
meanings.sent4: Fear was possessing her thoughts as she walked through the dark forest.
meanings.sent5: The storm is possessing the power to cause chaos.

meanings.sent1: The artist is possessing her latest masterpiece at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The actor is possessing incredible talent on stage.
meanings.sent3: The clown is possessing his funny antics at the circus.
meanings.sent4: The sunset is possessing vibrant colors in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The flowers are possessing a beautiful display in the garden.
